name: HotdogsAndZombies
description:
Welcome to the Apocalypse! 

You are the owner of a hot dog stand and need to sell your hotdogs to your hungry customers to get money to buy yourself magacines for your pistol.

You need your pistol to fend off zombies attacking your wall. If your wall breaks, you lose.

You need to cook your hotdogs in the furnace and lay them in the bread before selling them to your customer (else you don't make profit).

~ made by @lukasiguess and @thebone12
